name: @tenmilesquare/api-gateway-openapi-example
description: A boilerplate API to show what is possible through api gateway with OpenAPI spec integration.

scripts.start: npm run build && sam local start-api
scripts.version:view: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g'
scripts.get:ApiId: source env.sh && aws cloudformation describe-stack-resources --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --logical-resource-id ServiceApi --query "StackResources[0].PhysicalResourceId" --output text
scripts.build:spec: export API_VERSION=`npm run --silent version:view` && ts-node scripts/build_openapi.ts
scripts.deploy:sam: source env.sh && aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template template_deploy.yaml --s3-bucket ${STACK_BUCKET}
scripts.deploy:cloudformation: source env.sh && export API_VERSION=`npm run --silent version:view` && aws cloudformation deploy --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --template-file template_deploy.yaml --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --parameter-overrides "DefinitionBody=${OPEN_API_CONTENT}" --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.teardown: source env.sh && npm run clean && aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name ${STACK_NAME}
scripts.build: npm install; npm run build:compile; npm run build:spec; npm prune --production; cp -r node_modules dist/; npm install
scripts.deploy: source env.sh && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run deploy:sam && npm run deploy:cloudformation

author: Ten Mile Square <info@tenmilesquare.com>
